dict.string: Shut Up is a general-purpose comment blocker for Safari.

Websites are redesigned without advance notice. To keep up with this, Shut Up uses [a stylesheet on my server](https://rickyromero.com/shutup/updates/shutup.css) to block comments. It checks this file for updates every 2 days. This is only for maintaining effective comment blocking â€“ [Shut Up doesn't track you](https://rickyromero.com/shutup/privacy/).
Permanently denying this connection may gradually degrade Shut Up's comment blocking as websites are redesigned.
